message:
Just a small qol update for my Refined Character Creator: https://perchance.org/ai-character-chat?data=Refined_Character_Creator~c011a2ebf90777702a3dc092326cad47.gz

Removed a single criteria that was, effectively, a holdover from its former life üòÖ

Its just slightly more wholesome now ‚ò∫Ô∏è

Anyway, provide a URL or just a character name (or any amount of details you want) and it generates the entire character in a much more detailed and easy to edit format than the default "Unknown" character provided on the homepage.
